Activity: Arrive at the office. Check emails and calendar. Review the status of all tasks.
Finalize the document outlining recommended changes to the fund's accounting policies and procedures. Share this document with @facc-1 (Fund Accountant) and @coo-1 (Chief Operating Officer).
Schedule a follow-up meeting with @facc-1 (Fund Accountant) to discuss the recommended changes in more detail and address any questions or concerns.
Finalize the preliminary audit plan based on all feedback received. Prepare a summary of the plan for presentation to senior management.
Prepare a brief presentation summarizing the key elements of the preliminary audit plan, including the scope, objectives, risk assessment, and audit procedures.
Send out the finalized audit plan to all relevant members
Review all documentation prepared during the week to ensure accuracy and completeness. Organize files and prepare for storage.
Plan for next week's activities, prioritizing tasks and setting realistic deadlines.
End of day. Tidy up my workspace and leave for the weekend.
